name: RSLT_COMP_RCHTXT
description: This table contains a a list of lines which hold multi-line rich text comments for components on the result.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for a component on the result from the RES_COMPONENTS table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple rich text comments for a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.

columns.name: RCH_TEXT_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a specific group of rich text comments for a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.
